name: Cauliflower-and-White-Bean Brandade
keywords: appetizer, cauliflower, garlic, mashed potatoes, olive oil, white beans
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup mashed and sieved cooked white beans
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes, cauliflower, beans and garlic in a food processor and pulse until combined. With the motor running, drizzle in the oil. Transfer to a bowl and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve with Cauliflower Fritters and Stilton Rouille (see recipes).
